title: Why does my client continue to crash?
body:
My client continues to crash every time I join a lobby, or in some part of the champion select process. It continues to freeze and crash over and over. I've checked my internet speeds and I am experiencing some drop in speeds due to Holiday peeks hours and everything but not enough to account for the amount of crashes. I've tried to just play some custom games to see if the client will allow that and it crashes and fails to create them and just gives me a pop up saying an unexplained issue has occurred. Now again for the 3rd week I've been dealing with random crashes and client issues, leading to 30 minute bans. Which can I get a reasoning behind your decision to make it a 30 minute ban time?

Thanks for your time, hoping to one day understand. 
FutureShamann

replies.body:
First, I wanted to mention that the 30-min queue timer is added to your account after a *recent trend* of disconnecting occurs. While I cannot remove it, we can work toward resolving this technical issue that's contributing to the disconnections at this point. Since this error is commonly associated with your client dropping its connection to the servers, I'd strongly recommend configuring your local network settings according to our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

Please let me know if you continue to experience these disconnections *after* taking those steps.
Ran the HRT and it says "everything is ok"
How did the rest of the steps in that guide go for you?

My apologies i thought i responded to this days ago. 
They have been running slightly better. The day asked I had 2 fails, so enough to initiate the 30min ban time, but once isnt so bad.. i guess... 
But in general running better. Been able to play on the Alpha client and not get crashes as often.

If you experience any other disconnections, I'd strongly recommend escalating this to our tech specialists by having you submit a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). I'd also recommend attaching some support tickets using our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).

Let me know if you run into any issues.
also wanted to mention that the problem is much worse on the Alpha Client then on the Legacy. On the legacy client its only about 1 in 5 lobbies. On the Alpha its closer to 80% of the time.

I will give this a chance thank you for your response. 

May I ask what qualifies as a trend? As I play your game pretty much all day after I get off work baring spending some time with friends and family; and it seems as if you disconnect 1 time it is a 5-6 minute ban time, (which is fair and reasonable I suppose), but then spikes to over or equal to 5x's the wait time on the 2nd disconnect even if its been over 3 hours. What is the deciding factor on the additional 25 minutes of ban time if it happened twice in a 4 hour period, separated by 3 hours. 
Don't get me wrong I fully understand the need for ban times and why they exist. I support a punishment system, but 1/48th of your user's entire day? That seems a tad extreme.

Just an update still happening on both the legacy and the alpha. Didnt want you to think running the HRT made it better. 
and yes i have run it since
24:34 til i can queue up again.
